ActionDescriptionVector Class Reference

Vector class for ActionDescriptions which prevents duplicate entries. More...

Public Member Functions

void push_back (ActionDescription *element)

Detailed Description

Vector class for ActionDescriptions which prevents duplicate entries.

Member Function Documentation

void ActionDescriptionVector::push_back ( ActionDescription *  element  ) 
Parameters:
element - the action description to add to the vector

Adds the element to the end of the vector. If the element matches an element that is already in the vector, the new element is simply deleted.

Referenced by AppRover::Clean(), AppRover::Install(), and AppRover::Uninstall().
